column6: A battle beyond all expectations! It's the alien invaders-the Squadron Supreme-versus the combined might of The Ultimates, Ultimate X-Men, Ultimate Fantastic Four and Ultimate Spidey...for the fate of the world! What more could you ask?
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller (cover):Greg Land | colorist:Justin Ponsor | inker:Matt Ryan
